
To generate a ``github`` variable dump, add this job under ``steps``::

    - name: Dump github context
      run: echo "${GITHUB_CONTEXT}"
      shell: bash
      env:
        GITHUB_CONTEXT: ${{ toJson(github) }}

-------

Output::
